long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the "hire.me" Chrome extension - a simple yet powerful tool that helps you quickly count the number of words and characters of most web pages. 

Key Features:

Instant Word Count: Access the total word count of any web page with a single click. Whether you're proofreading an article or keeping track of a word limit, this extension provides you with the information you need in seconds.

Accurate Character Count: Keep track of the total number of characters on a web page, including spaces, punctuation marks, and special characters.

Easy-to-Use Interface: The extension features a clean and user-friendly interface, making it incredibly simple to view word and character counts without any distractions.

Wide Compatibility: The "hire.me" extension works with most websites, ensuring that you can rely on it for accurate word and character counts across the web.

Lightweight & Efficient: Designed with performance in mind, this extension is lightweight and won't slow down your browsing experience.

The "hire.me" extension is perfect for writers, editors, students, and anyone who needs quick access to word and character counts while browsing the web. With its seamless integration into your Chrome browser, this extension becomes an indispensable tool that helps you stay on top of your writing tasks.

Install today and enjoy the convenience of having instant word and character counts at your fingertips!
